vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.6.11;
son of: Joash (H3101);
father of: Jether (H3500), Abimelech (H0040H) and Jotham (H3147); also called Jerubbaal at Jdg.6.32; 7.1; 8.29,35; 9.1,2,5,16,19,24,28,57; 1xJerubbesheth at 2Sa.11.21;
Another name of gid.on (גִּדְעוֹן "Gideon" H1439)
§ Jerubbaal = "let Baal contend"
name given to Gideon by his father when he destroyed the altar of Baal
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Joás; juez de Israel; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶路巴力 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "讓巴力抗爭"
當基甸把巴力的祭壇拆毀時, 其父所給他另起的名字
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶路巴力 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "让巴力抗争"
当基甸把巴力的祭坛拆毁时, 其父所给他另起的名字
